short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Free video screencast recording right from Gmail.
short.de: Kostenlose Video-Screencast-Aufzeichnung direkt aus Google Mail.
short.es: Grabación gratuita de video screencast directamente desde Gmail.
short.fr: Enregistrement de screencast vidéo gratuit directement depuis Gmail.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The BEST free video screen capture option out there. 

It captures your voice, and anything you want to show that's on your screen. It uploads directly as a link in your Gmail to your screencast video. Use it for education, customer service, or anything that you want to share. 

Key features:
- Upload directly to YouTube
- Upload to Google Drive, Dropbox, or Box
- Customize your screencast page with your own logo and promotions
- Full integration with Gmail
- Add screencast to your Gmail signature
- Measure views and stats

cloudhQ. Helping your productivity, 1 click at a time.


Website: https://www.record-my-screen.com/
Pricing: 100% FREE
Support page: https://support.cloudhq.net/category/browser-extensions/gmail_screencast/
Blog: https://blog.cloudhq.net
